welcome_benefits: Choose any one benefit from, a Luxe gift card, a complimentary night stay at Oberoi hotels, or gift vouchers from brands like Hush Puppies, BATA, Titan, Pantaloons, Raymond, etc.

Movie & Dining: BOGO on Movie Ticket Bookings Up to ₹200 (Thrice Each Month)
Rewards Rate: Earn 2.5 reward points per Rs. 100 spent online, 1.5 reward points per Rs. 100 spent on online travel and flight bookings,  1 RP for spends of Rs. 100 on other purchases.
Reward Redemption: 1 RP = ₹0.75 for Redeeming Against Cash Credit. RPs Can Also Be Redeemed for KrisFlyer Miles and Maharaja Club Points
International Lounge Access: 1 Complimentary International Lounge Visit With Priority Pass
Golf: 1 Complimentary Golf Lesson and 1 Golf Game Every Month
Insurance Benefits: Several Travel Related Insurance Covers are Offered, Such as Air Accident Cover

fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waiver applicable on all fuel transactions

product_details: Exciting gift vouchers from popular brands like Oberoi Hotels, Luxe, Postcard, etc., can be used as a welcome gift.
Up to 2.5 Reward Points per ₹100 spent.
Buy 1 Get 1 Free (BOGO) offer on movie tickets via BookMyShow.
Complimentary access to domestic & international airport lounges.
